Plot: Kevin's mother struggles to love her strange child, despite the increasingly vicious things he says and does as he grows up. But Kevin is just getting started, and his final act will be beyond anything anyone imagined.
Title: We Need to Talk About Kevin
Writer: Lynne Ramsay (screenplay), Rory Stewart Kinnear (screenplay), Lionel Shriver (novel)
Actors: Tilda Swinton, John C. Reilly, Ezra Miller, Jasper Newell
tomatoConsensus: We Need to Talk About Kevin is a masterful blend of drama and horror, with fantastic performances across the board (Tilda Swinton especially, delivering one of her very best).
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 26 wins & 61 nominations.
